parameters: \unknownThis flame is still lit.\| Whoever stays here has not been gone for long.\| Could it be Lyon's?
\unknownWhat is this?\| Seems to be some sort of memo.
\unknown12 years ago... could it be related to...-
\lyonWhoever you are,\.\. you've made a mistake coming here!
\unknownLyon!\| Where did you go?\| Didn't you say you were going to come back to get me?
\unknownLyon\..\..\.. I just came from the village.
\lyonGrgh.\..\.. I was so full of myself.\| I thought I could stop them.\| I made a promise and then I-\.\.\.
\unknownYou are being way too hard on yourself!
\unknownYou fought your hardest\..\..\.. I wasn't able to help at all.
\unknownBut, it all doesn't matter anymore!\| What happened is in the past now!\| Let's not waste what luck we have now!
\lyonI wish the villagers could say the same\..\..\..
\unknownAre you going to keep moping?\| When I saw you fight those bandits I didn't expect you to be such a whiny baby!
\unknownIf you're so sad about the dead, think about it!\| They couldn't be saved, but what about the future victims of those bloodthirsty creeps?!
\unknownI know you understand!\| Those guys are still walking around scott-free! Who knows where they'll attack next!?
\unknown\..\..\.. Right. I never even told you my name.\| Here I am, after having stalked you to your\..\..\.. wonderful home here.  Rambling on like a looney, and you have no idea what my name is!
\lyon\..\..\.. Are you going to tell me your name?
\elleMy name is Elle.\| Pleasure to\..\..\.. formally meet you.
\lyonRight. Elle. So about the bandits that attacked...-
\elleAgain?\| I'm not helpless!\.\. I'll show him.
--NEW GOAL: HEAD WEST TO RIVELT TO LEARN MORE ABOUT THE BANDIT ATTACKS AND MOTIVATION.
